name: scale-shot
flavor_text: The user attacks by shooting scales two to five times in a row. This move boosts the user's Speed stat but lowers its Defense stat.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage two to five times in a row, raising the user's Speed and lowering the user's Defense by one stage each upon last hit.
effect_text_simple: Boosts the user's Speed and lowers their Defense by one stage after inflicting damage two to five times in a row.
